title: Projects
description: Schema describing the structure of projects.json entries used for rendering the projects page.

title.description: Display name for the project card.

website.description: Public marketing or product website for the project.

href.description: Link to the project codebase (public or private placeholder).

image.description: Path to the card background image.

summary.description: Short description shown on the card.

private.description: True when the codebase is proprietary and not publicly accessible.
